title: Concussion

fields.name: activity_guidance
fields.label: Activity guidance
fields.default: Gradually return to normal activity; avoid contact sport until symptom-free.

body:
You were assessed for a concussion (mild traumatic brain injury).

Rest and recovery:
- Take {{time_off_work}} off work or school if possible.
- Sleep is helpful; limit screens if they worsen symptoms.
- Avoid alcohol or sedating medications unless prescribed.

{{#if activity_guidance}}Activity guidance:
{{activity_guidance}}

{{/if}}Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Worsening headache or repeated vomiting
- Increasing confusion, drowsiness, or seizures
- New weakness, numbness, or vision changes

Arrange GP follow-up if symptoms persist beyond 7–10 days.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
